subject: Extract mode handlers from orchestrator
description:
Refactor orchestrator.ts (27KB) by extracting mode-specific logic:
- Create `services/voiceNexus/modes/` directory
- Extract `realtimeMode.ts` - Gemini Live bidirectional handling
- Extract `turnBasedMode.ts` - Browser STT → Claude → ElevenLabs flow
- Extract `hybridMode.ts` - Gemini STT → Claude → ElevenLabs flow
- Each mode implements common interface: `start()`, `stop()`, `processInput()`
- Orchestrator becomes thin coordinator selecting and delegating to modes

Goal: Reduce orchestrator from 27KB to ~10KB coordination-only code
